people.name: Andrej Karpathy
people.why: Makes deep AI concepts accessible. His Zero to Hero series set the standard for AI education.

people.name: Simon Willison
people.why: Ships tools (Datasette, llm CLI) and writes the most thorough LLM coverage on the internet. Build-in-public gold standard.

people.name: Swyx (Shawn Wang)
people.why: Coined 'AI Engineer', runs Latent Space. Bridges research and production like nobody else.

people.name: Harrison Chase
people.why: Built the most adopted LLM framework. Moved fast, learned in public, shaped how people build with LLMs.

people.name: Jeremy Howard
people.why: Democratized deep learning. Practical AI education that actually works.

people.name: Guillermo Rauch
people.why: Built the deployment platform that powers modern web. v0 is the best example of AI meeting developer tools.

people.name: Theo Browne
people.why: Honest tech takes, ships fast, built a massive YouTube presence through pure technical depth.

people.name: Kent C. Dodds
people.why: Testing Library, Epic Web. Turned deep React expertise into scalable education.

people.name: Ali Abdaal
people.why: Scaled from doctor to multi-million dollar creator business. Evidence-based productivity.

people.name: Tina Huang
people.why: Tech career content that resonates. Built audience through authentic technical storytelling.

people.name: Dan Koe
people.why: Systemized the one-person business model. Clean design, deep thinking, no fluff.

people.name: Sahil Lavingia
people.why: Built the creator economy infrastructure. Transparent about building and failure.

people.name: Udio Team
people.why: Pushing the quality ceiling for AI-generated music. Competition drives the whole space forward.

people.name: Suno Team
people.why: Made AI music creation accessible to everyone. v4 changed what's possible.

people.name: Rick Beato
people.why: Deep music theory made accessible. The standard for quality music education on YouTube.

people.name: Andrew Ng
people.why: Coursera ML course taught millions. Now building the AI enterprise playbook at Landing AI.

people.name: Chip Huyen
people.why: Wrote the book on ML systems. Bridges research and production with clarity.

people.name: Hamel Husain
people.why: Practical LLM advice from real production experience. No hype, just what works.

people.name: Rauno Freiberg
people.why: The intersection of design and engineering at the highest level. Every detail matters.

people.name: Paco Coursey
people.why: Minimal, precise web craft. cmdk and other tools that just feel right.

people.name: Lee Robinson
people.why: Best developer education in the Next.js ecosystem. Clear, practical, always shipping.
